knimeNode.name: Don't Save End (URI Port)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Ends a block of a workflow that is reset once this node is executed, deleting all intermediate results.

intro.p: Indicates that from this node on, data will be saved again when the workflow is saved. Intermediate results from nodes between the corresponding Don't Save Start node and this node are reset when this node is executed. The incoming data from the last node in the block is provided at the output of this node.
This node is an adaption of the Don't Save End node from the KNIME Image Processing plugin. If you need the same functionality for tables, use the nodes provided there.

ports.outPort: Same files as on the input.
